quiz_array.question: Why is AWS more economical than traditional data centers for applications with varying compute workloads?
quiz_array.answer_1: Amazon EC2 costs are billed on a monthly basis.
quiz_array.answer_2: Users retain full administrative access to their Amazon EC2 instances.
quiz_array.answer_3: Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
quiz_array.answer_4: Users can permanently run enough instances to handle peak workloads.
quiz_array.right_answer: Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.

quiz_array.question: Which AWS service would simplify the migration of a database to AWS?
